description.value: Logical Model: Prostate cancer.

short.value: The subject of the report, usually, but not always, the patient

definition.value: The subject of the report. Usually, but not always, this is a patient. However diagnostic services also perform analyses on specimens collected from a variety of other sources.

map.value: PID-3-Patient ID List (no V2 mapping for Group or Device)

definition.value: The practitioner that holds legal responsibility for ordering the investigation.
The diagnostic service that is responsible for issuing the report.

comments.value: This is not necessarily the source of the atomic data items - it is the entity that takes responsibility for the clinical report.

requirements.value: Need to know whom to contact if there are queries about the results. Also may need to track the source of reports for secondary data analysis.

definition.value: Pre Analytic component - information collection prior to specimen receipt at laboratory.

comments.value: This is just a group/section header and is not a result field.

definition.value: Clinical information provided on request form.
Clinical history (including Gleason grade and score of previous specimens).

short.value: Relevant clinical information for clinicopathological staging

definition.value: Relevant clinical information for clinicopathological staging.

comments.value: This is just a group/section header and is not a result field.

definition.value: Specimen weight (ie Prostate without seminal vesicles).

description.value: A code that idicates the presence (partially or completely resected) or absence of seminal vesicles

definition.value: If lymph nodes are received, then they should be recorded.

requirements.value: Conditional: If received, record the number of nodes.

human.value: If lymph nodes are present record S3.07 lymph node status.
If lymph nodes are present consider recording G2.20 (laterality & site(s) and numbers of lymph nodes)

description.value: A code that indicates if lymph nodes were present or absent

definition.value: If lymph nodes are received, then they should be recorded.

requirements.value: Conditional: If received, record the number of nodes.

description.value: A code that indicates the laterality of lymph nodes

short.value: Site(s) and numbers of lymph nodes

definition.value: Site(s) and numbers of lymph nodes.

requirements.value: Note that the site and number of LNs for that site may need to be repeated for each site received.

definition.value: A descriptive or narrative field should be provided to record any macroscopic information that is not recorded in the above standards and guidelines, and that would normally form part of the macroscopic description.

comments.value: This is just a group/section header and is not a result field.

human.value: If the histological tumour type is Adenocarcinoma (Acinar variant eg foamy, pseudohyperplastic), then record the variant.
If the histological tumour type is other, then record the other type.

description.value: A code for tumout type from a multi selection value list (select all that apply)

map.value: Field wasn't in protocol but should have been!!

comments.value: This is just a group/section header and is not a result field.

description.value: A code from a single selection value list for the largest nodule located by quadrant
A code from a single selection value list for the largest nodule located by plane

comments.value: If present, record the locations in quadrant and plane.

human.value: If there are other nodules >10mm in diameter then record the locations in quadrant and plane.

description.value: A code from a single selection value list to indicate other nodules >10mm in diameter
A code from a multi selection value list (select all that apply) to indicate other nodule locations by quadrant
A code from a multi selection value list (select all that apply) to indicate other nodule locations by plane

comments.value: This is just a group/section header and is not a result field.

valueString.value: Composite Gleason Score (ISUP) 2005): 3+4=7 Index carcinoma score (ISUP 2005): 4+3=7 % High Grade (4/5): 40% (composite), 65% index. Intraduct carcinoma: Absent.
Composite Gleason Score (ISUP) 2005): 3+4=7 Index carcinoma score (ISUP 2005): 3+4=7 % High Grade (4/5): 10% Intraduct carcinoma: Absent.
Composite Gleason Score (ISUP) 2005): 3+4=7 Index carcinoma score (ISUP 2005): 3+4=7 % High Grade (4/5): 5%. Intraduct carcinoma: Absent.
Composite Gleason Score (ISUP) 2005): 4+5=9 Index carcinoma score (ISUP 2005): 4+5=9 % High Grade (4/5): 90%. Intraduct carcinoma: Absent.
Composite Gleason Score (ISUP) 2005): 3+4=7 Index carcinoma score (ISUP 2005): 3+4=7 % High Grade (4/5): 20%. Intraduct carcinoma: Absent.

comments.value: If present, record S3.04 extent. If present, consider recording G3.04.

human.value: If an extraprostatic extension is present, then record the extent and consider recording the locations(s) of the EPE.

description.value: A code from a single selection value list for the extraprostatic extension

comments.value: If present, record S3.04 extent. If present, consider recording G3.04.

description.value: A code from a single selection value list for the extraprostatic extension extent

comments.value: If other, specify the other location.

human.value: If the location of the extraprostatic extension is other, then record the record the other locations(s) of the EPE.

description.value: A code from a multi select value list (select all that apply) for the location(s) of EPE
A code from a single selection value to indicate the involvement of the margin status

requirements.value: Multi select value list (select all that apply):.

human.value: If the margin status is involved, the record the location(s) and optionally the extent; the Gleason score at the margin and the type of positivity.

description.value: A code from a multi select value list (select all that apply) for location(s) on the invovled margins

valueString.value: Tumour location: Quadrants: Anterior left greater than right plus posterior right and left. Zones: Transitional, peripheral and anterior fibromuscular.
Tumour location: Quadrants: Left posterior Zones:Peripheral
Tumour location: Left lobe greater than right, posterior greater than anterior Quadrants: All four quadrants involved Zones:Peripheral
Tumour location: Quadrants: All four Zones:Peripheral, base and apex
Tumour location: Quadrants: Right posterolateral greater than left Zones:Peripheral

comments.value: Conditional on margin involvement.

requirements.value: Numeric: ___mm Notes: If more than 1 positive margin, record the cummulative length.

comments.value: Conditional on margin involvement.

requirements.value: Numeric: __ Notes: If more than 1 positive margin, record the highest score.

comments.value: Conditional on margin involvement.

requirements.value: Multi select value list (select all that apply):.

description.value: A code from a multi select value list (select all that apply) for the type of margin positivity

comments.value: If involved, record side.

human.value: If the seminal vesicles are involved, then record the side.

description.value: A code from a single selection value to indicate the involvement of the seminal vesicles
A code from a single selection value to indicate the side of the seminal vesicles
A code from a single selection value to indicate the involvement of the bladder neck

comments.value: This is just a group/section header and is not a result field This is conditional on receipt of LNs in S2.03.
If >0 consider recording G3.09 and G3.10.

human.value: If there are positive lymph nodes consider recording G3.09 laterality and G3.10 maximum dimension of largest deposit.

definition.value: The laterality of any lymph node involvement should be recorded.

comments.value: Consider recording the site(s) of involved nodes.

human.value: If there are positive lymph nodes with indicated laterality consider recording the site(s) of the involved nodes.

description.value: A code that indicates the laterality of lymph nodes

definition.value: The maximum dimension of the largest lymph node deposit may be recorded.

description.value: A code from a single selection value to indicate the extent of lymphovascular invasion

definition.value: Synthesis and Overview are to be recorded.

comments.value: This is just a group/section header and is not a result field.

definition.value: Tumour stage is to be recorded.

comments.value: This is just a sub-group/sub-section header and is not a result field.

definition.value: Primary Tumour stage T is to be recorded.

comments.value: Notes: 1. Invasion into the prostate apex or into (but not beyond) the prostate capsule is not classified as T3, but as T2. * There is no pathologic T1 classification for radical prostatectomy specimens ** Positive surgical margin should be indicated by an R1 descriptor (residual microscopic disease).

description.value: A code that records primary tumour stage T

definition.value: Regional lymph nodes (N) is to be recorded.

description.value: A code that records regional lymph nodes stage N

definition.value: Distant metastasis (M) is to be recorded.

description.value: A code that records distant metastasis stage M

short.value: Year and/or edition of staging system

definition.value: Year and/or edition of staging system is to be recorded.

requirements.value: Numeric: year AND/OR Text: Edition eg 1st, 2nd etc.

valueString.value: 1. Radical prostatectomy: Prostatic adenocarcinoma 2. Left pelvic lymph node: Fibradipose tissue only 3. Right pelvic lymph node: No evidence of malignancy 4. Periprostatic tissue: No evidence of malignancy 5. Left apical margin: No evidence of mailgnancy 6. Left lateral margin: No evidence of malignancy
1. Radical prostatectomy: Adenocarcinoma 2. Right pelvic lymph nodes: No evidence of malignancu (0/4) 3. Periprostatic fat: No evidence of malignancy

definition.value: Diagnostic summary is to be recorded.

requirements.value: Include: a. specimen type b. tumour site c. Gleason score d. tumour stage e. whether or not the specimen margins are involved.

valueString.value: Supplementary report by Dr F Maclean: The specimen jar has been examined and no residual tissue is apprarent. Multiple deeper levels of the blocks have been examined and an additional small benign lymph node measuring less than 1mm in maximum dimension has been identified. There is no additional evidence of malignancy. The above synpotic has been amended to reflect the resence of this node.
